hero.title: The Future of Islamic knowledge, powered by AI
hero.subtitle: Join us in making the study of Islamic sources accessible, searchable, and analyzable at scale.
hero.description: With your support, Usul has made thousands of historical texts more accessible, reaching tens of thousands of users around the world.

features.0: Collecting and making accessible in one place over 15,000 digitized Islamic sources in PDF and eBook format, with a clean, readable format.
features.1: Transforming static PDFs into structured, machine-readable formats for easier search and analysis.

features.0: Advanced search capabilities that allow users to quickly locate precise information.
features.1: AI-powered assistants that allow researchers to navigate large volumes of text with ease.

three.title: Beautiful User Experience
three.description: We strive to make our work beautiful and loved by beginner students of knowledge and advanced scholars alike. From the reading experience, to the search interface, to the mobile experience.

roadmap.title: Usul’s Roadmap: Our Vision for the Future
roadmap.description: Your donations will help us achieve the following goals:

features.0: Incorporate state-of-the-art search tools and the latest AI models to enable researchers to quickly locate precise information.
features.1: Enable efficient navigation of vast Islamic textual sources.

features.0: Collaborate with leading scholars to develop a representative “core corpus” across all major Islamic fields.
features.1: Create curated collections tailored to various genres.

features.0: Build the infrastructure and partnerships with libraries and other online repositories to house a universal, comprehensive corpus of texts in structured digital formats.
features.1: Ensure that, as the world of online knowledge grows, all works are accessible, searchable, and analyzable.

be-part.title: Support Usul’s Mission
be-part.description: Your contribution enables the development of short-term research and it sustains the long-term development of innovative tools for Islamic research.

features.0: Accelerate Islamic research into cutting edge problems of the day that require quick analysis across vast resources–from ethical Islamic AI and governance to how and whether to use AI to produce legal opinions, medical diagnoses, and financial matters
features.1: Accelerate Islamic education and Islamic knowledge more generally, by building the infrastructure for use in global schools, universities, and courts in need of reliable ‘internal’ or comparative Islamic research tools
features.2: Play a vital role in shaping the future of how Islam is preserved and studied

choose-amount.title: Choose your donation amount:
choose-amount.note: Donations are collected by Usul Foundation, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization (pending). All donations are tax-deductible in the US. You may adjust or cancel your contribution at any time.

success.title: Thank You for Your Donation!
success.description: Your generosity makes a real difference. We appreciate your support in our mission.

verification.description: Email is required to send you receipts and donor updates.
